name: Newton's Game of Gravity
description:
A game of where a  you, Newton, must move left and right to not get hit by an apple.

*NOTE* computer game

Controls:

a / <- = move left

d / -> = move right

if you want to use mobile,  go into settings (gear) and click on the button on the top until it says "MOBILE" then you can click play and you should see buttons on  the bottom.
